text: The 1998 Penn State Nittany Lions football team represented the Pennsylvania State University in the 1998 NCAA Division I-A football season. The team was coached by Joe Paterno and played its home games in Beaver Stadium in University Park, Pennsylvania. ==Schedule== Penn State did not play Big Ten teams Indiana and Iowa this year. ==Roster== ==Post season== ===NFL Draft=== Two Nittany Lions were drafted in the 1999 NFL Draft. {| class="wikitable" |- ! Round !! Pick !! Overall !! Name !! Position !! Team |- | 5th || 5 || 138 || Brad Scioli || Defensive end || Indianapolis Colts |- | 5th || 7 || 140 || Floyd Wedderburn || Offensive guard || Seattle Seahawks |} ==References== Penn State Category:Penn State Nittany Lions football seasons Category:Lambert- Meadowlands Trophy seasons Category:Outback Bowl champion seasons Penn State Nittany Lions football
title: 1998 Penn State Nittany Lions football team
